message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $15,000 for this exceptional item. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects the high quality and unique features of the product.

Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the value you're placing on your product, $15,000 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. This would still be a good deal for both of us, as it's the maximum I can afford. Let me know what you think.
